ref: 10944 lapsuda n. ʻ goat's beard ʼ KātyŚr.com. [lapsudín- ʻ bearded (of goats) ʼ TS.]
P. lacchā m. ʻ several skeins of cotton joined together ʼ;
N. lāchā ʻ tassel of sheep's wool plaited into a woman's hair ʼ;
H. lacchā m. ʻ necklace of silk or beads, bundle or skein of silk ʼ;
G. lāchɔ m. ʻ skein of silk ʼ: very doubtful.
